title: Faced With Ukrainian Turmoil, NATO Considers New 'Rapid Reaction Force'
teaser: In response to unrest in eastern Ukraine, NATO is considering forming a rapid reaction force â€” a topic that will be discussed at a summit this week in Wales. But how will Russia react, and is this the right move for the alliance? To learn more, Audie Cornish speaks with Steven Pifer, the director of Arms Control and Non-Proliferation Initiative at the Brookings Institution.
